pull.title: test: Replace 0xC0 constant
pull.body: Instead it should be the named constant `LEAF_VERSION_TAPSCRIPT`.

events.message:
test: Replace 0xC0 constant

Instead it should be the named constant `LEAF_VERSION_TAPSCRIPT`.

events.body: Updated.  I've left `VALID_LEAF_VERS` alone because, logically speaking, the definition of the valid tapleaf versions (defined in BIP-341) is independent of the choice of which tapleaf version to assign to tapscript (defined in BIP-342).

issue.title: test: Flaky feature_taproot.py test
issue.body: `python3 feature_taproot.py --randomseed 5917870124839323498` fails.  Consolidated logs are available upon request.

issue.title: elements-22.1.1-rc1
issue.body:
Preparation for 22.1.1.

Merge master branch
Backport fixes from https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/tree/22.x
Manually backport https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27143 
Manually backport https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27122 (preparation for simplicity)

Disable test that doesn't run anymore in cirrus.
Update Copyright year
Update manpages
Update version
